headers.value: default-src 'self' *.vercel.app vercel.live; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com https://esm.sh *.vercel.app vercel.live; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' *.vercel.app vercel.live; img-src 'self' data: *.vercel.app vercel.live; font-src 'self' data: *.vercel.app *.gstatic.com vercel.live; connect-src 'self' *.vercel.app vercel.live vitals.vercel-insights.com;
